title: Iran, 2020 Elections & Gun Control
itunes:title: Iran, 2020 Elections & Gun Control
description:
Kevin spoke with Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and Former Senior Adviser in the Trump Administration, and Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist; long time Obama aide and Principal of New Day Strategy. They discussed President Donald Trump's comments on Iran, the 2020 elections, and gun control.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
